subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The simple twist of fate that placed Novak Djokovic on Rafael Nadal’s half of the bracket has the potential to smooth Roger Federer’s path to his first French Open title.
snippet: The simple twist of fate that placed Novak Djokovic on Rafael Nadal’s half of the bracket has the potential to smooth Roger Federer’s path to his first French Open title.
